prestige_Permanent_Undead_Slaying_Axe.help: This massive weapon was specifically crafted by MAGI to slay the undead. Note that Mastermind Henchmen are protected from this effect. Damage enhancing powers do not apply to the Ghost Slaying Axe. Damage: Moderate. Recharge: Slow
prestige_Permanent_Undead_Slaying_Axe.shortHelp: Melee, Moderate DMG(Lethal), Bonus vs True Undead

prestige_Permanent_Nemesis_Staff.help: This strange, steam-powered staff shoots a bolt of energy that deals damage, knocks back foes. The Nemesis is particularly effective when wielded by Technology, Science or Natural origin individuals. Damage enhancing powers do not apply to the Nemesis Staff. Damage: Moderate. Recharge: Slow

prestige_Permanent_Sands_of_Mu.help: You have found some strange black sand. While carrying it, you have the ability to deal a flurry of punches charged with the Negative Energy of the Netherworld. Damage enhancing powers do not apply to the Sands of Mu. Damage: High. Recharge: Slow
prestige_Permanent_Sands_of_Mu.targetHelp: You are being pummeled by negative energy! Your Accuracy is reduced.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage over time.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.

prestige_Permanent_Blackwand.help: This black metal wand feels cold in your hand, and glows with dark arcane energies. When used by Magic, Mutant or Natural origin individuals, the potency of its attacks are increased. Damage enhancing powers do not apply to Blackwand. Damage: Moderate. Recharge: Slow

Brawl_Charm.help: You have learned a simple magic spell: the Apprentice Charm. This cantrip has a very short range, and deals minor Energy damage to your target, as well as lowering their resistance to further damage. This power receives a damage bonus that decreases as you level up. At around level 15 you stop benefiting from this power's damage bonus altogether. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
Brawl_Charm.targetHelp: Your damage resistance has been reduced by the Magic Charm

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

Brawl_Knives.help: You've acquired these throwing knives as part of your personal arsenal. You can throw these knives at a very short range, and deal minor Lethal damage to your target, but a nasty wound will do additional Damage over Time. This power receives a damage bonus that decreases as you level up. At around level 15 you stop benefiting from this power's damage bonus altogether. Damage: Minor (DoT), Recharge: Fast
Brawl_Knives.targetHelp: You are taking additional Damage over Time from the wound left by the Throwing Knife.

Brawl_Mutagen.help: You have recently come into possession of these capsules of genetic Mutagen. You can hurl these capsules at your enemies at very short range, where they explode on impact. They deal only minor toxic damage but the mutagen's secondary effect will lower the damage the affected target deals out. This power receives a damage bonus that decreases as you level up. At around level 15 you stop benefiting from this power's damage bonus altogether. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
Brawl_Mutagen.targetHelp: Your damage has been reduced by the Mutagen.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage.

Brawl_Taser.help: You have acquired a basic technological weapon: a Taser Dart. This attack has a very short range and does minor Energy damage to your target. In addition it has a chance to Hold your opponent for a brief moment. This power receives a damage bonus that decreases as you level up. At around level 15 you stop benefiting from this power's damage bonus altogether. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
Brawl_Taser.targetHelp: You are being Held by the Taser Dart

Brawl_Tranq.help: Thanks to the advances of science, you know have access to a basic chemical weapon: the Tranq Dart. This attack can be used at short range to deal minor Lethal and Toxic damage to a target. In addition there is a small chance you can put the target to Sleep with this dart, but they will wake up the next time they are damaged or healed. This power receives a damage bonus that decreases as you level up. At around level 15 you stop benefiting from this power's damage bonus altogether. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
Brawl_Tranq.targetHelp: The Tranq Dart has put you to Sleep.
